long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Googley Eyes is a productivity-based Chrome extension! It monitors the websites you've visited and displays your latest places on the New Tab page as hyperlinks :) In this release the app includes the following features:

- Every time you open a new tab you can see your recent places and the total number of hours you've been browsing today.

- On clicking the googleyEyes icon in the toolbar you can see a full breakdown of your stats: all the places you've visited and the hours you've spent there, plus a pie chart of the same data for easy visualisation.

Enjoy!!
